item.description:
Carpool from Milford:  Meet at La Quinta Inn at 7:45 pm for departure at 8:00 pm
24 Beaver Street, Milford - located off 495 at exit 19 next to Burger King.

We'll dine in Foxboro at Waxy's Irish Pub...  meet us there at 8:30 pm or any time after that if you are not carpooling with us.

Tickets are $10.  You can purchase a bag of stuff for $1 to be used during the interactive part of the movie.

If you are just going to the show, meet us at the theatre at 10:30 pm.

Please let me know if you plan on carpooling with us from Milford by emailing me at jackierg@comcast.net
item.why: If you have to ask what this is, then this may not be the event for you. For those of you who know, I hope you can make it. We'll have a ball!
item.name: Rocky Horror Picture Show
